Name: Necroa Village
About the game: SUMMARY Necroa Village is an open world zombie survival game. You need find a way to get out of Necroa, before its get you. You are part of a special ops team sent to complete objective missions to aid in research for learning about the apocalypse to help the public. However, there are still many mysteries to unfold. Communications are down & you cannot contact the main base, but where is the rest of your unit? Given the situation you are in, you have no choice but to fend off zombies, scavenge for food, find shelter, and figure out what happened to the rest of your team. FEATURES Zombie combat Ammo System Gun System Complete missions Ranged weapons Animals Weather system Save system
